body:
Happy Easter!

To kick things off (though a bit late), I'm running an easter egg hunt on the lobby! Try to find all 10 eggs. They are represented by a sign, prismarine, glowstone, and an item frame with a squid inside it. Nothing is being offered as of now, but they're really easy to find! Post a screenshot with all of the squid eggs in your inventory and get bragging rights.

Current Winners;
- Tanpiku (>:))

Hints:
- Check the area where old games a-lie...
- Check a structure, wind it flies...
- Egg beyond, a falling stream of water...
- From an underground lava parkour, it gets hotter...
- In the treetop, lies a squid...
- For the maze, puzzled to win...
- Behind a sign, of a new game a liked...
- In a bedroom, mountains are hiked...
- And behind the green, shall a sign be seen.

Album of images with locations will be posted. Uploading new lobby now. Good luck!

title: The Great Egg Hunt of 2015

replies.body: And yes, we're aware the server is down. Once it comes back up, it'll be in effect from when it does to a span of 3 days, so in total 72 hours.
